name: Protect The Pearl
description:
Hey thanks for viewing my first game.

This is the first publicly available game I made.

If you leave a like or comment I would be very glad :)

This game is developed for this game jam

Instruction

[A] [D] - Movement

[Arrows] - Rotation

[E] - Pick Up Coconut

[Space] - Attack or Throw Coconut

[Left Click] - Interact with User Interface
